title: 3 Easy Ways to Turn Off and Unsync iCloud Music Library

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Music.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Music . You'll find this option near the middle of the Settings page.

steps.title: Toggle off "Sync Library".
steps.content: Toggle off "Sync Library". You can find this option underneath the Library header.

steps.title: Tap Turn Off.
steps.content: Tap Turn Off . This will remove all Apple Music content and downloads on your device. You can re-download the content at any time by toggling on "Sync Library" again. If you don't see an "iCloud Music Library" option here, you don't have an Apple Music subscription and cannot turn off (or on) iCloud Music Library. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Apple Music app.
steps.content: Open the Apple Music app. This looks like a white music note with a red background.

steps.title: Click Music.
steps.content: Click Music . This will be in the top menu bar. A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click Preferences.
steps.content: Click Preferences . A new window will open.

steps.title: Click General.
steps.content: Click General . This is the tab at the top.

steps.title: Uncheck "Sync Library".
steps.content: Uncheck "Sync Library". You can find this next to Library .

steps.title: Click OK.
steps.content: Click OK . This will save your changes. All Apple Music content and downloads on your device will be removed. You can re-download the content at any time by toggling on "Sync Library" again.

steps.title: Open iTunes.
steps.content: Open iTunes. This is the multi-colored music note with a white background. iTunes is available to download on Windows 11, 10, 8, and 7.

steps.title: Click Edit.
steps.content: Click Edit . This is in the menu bar, next to File .

steps.title: Click Preferences.
steps.content: Click Preferences . A new window will open.

steps.title: Uncheck "iCloud Music Library".
steps.content: Uncheck "iCloud Music Library". This will be below your library name. [2] X Research source If you don't see an "iCloud Music Library" option here, you don't have an Apple Music subscription and cannot turn off (or on) iCloud Music Library.

steps.title: Click OK.
steps.content: Click OK . This will save your changes. You can redownload the content at any time by toggling on "Sync Library" again.
